law.catch_line: This part applies to an electric company that:...
law.text:
This part applies to an electric company that:
has an obligation to provide standard offer service to residential electricity customers in accordance with § 7-510(c) of this subtitle; and
is not subject to a rate cap or price freeze under § 7-505(d) of this subtitle during the period for which a rate stabilization plan is requested under this part.
